Package com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.tool

Provides interfaces for development of extensions that enable invocation of external tools.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ToolHandler This interface defines the methods any general Tool Handler should implement.
 

Package com.ibm.hrl.xmleditor.extension.tool Description

Provides interfaces for development of extensions that enable invocation of external tools.
